question:
Mrs. Barette, an English-speaking woman who lives in your town, has advertised for someone to help her in her home for few hours a day next summer.
Write a letter to Mrs. Barette. In your letter
suggest how you could help her in her home
say why you would like to do this work
explain when you will and will not available
text: I am writing this letter regarding the advertisement that you published in our local newspaper. I would like to let you know that I am interested to help you with some of your household chores for a few hours per day this coming summer break.

I can help you to do your laundry. Cooking is my passion, so, there is no problem with that aspect. I can prepare a dinner meal for you. I also know how to clean the house since I always in-charge in doing it in our home. If there is another task that I forgot to mention, or/and I do not have experience with, I am willing to learn.
I am available, Monday to Friday, 8 to 11 in the morning, and the whole day at the weekend. Please be informed that I am an International student, so I have a class to attend  in the afternoon.
I hope you would consider me for the job. Looking forward to hearing from you.
